title: Resolve Note: 'Sat in my pants transcribing my world caving in'

source.verbatim: they forget that they’re fucking with, i’d tried to kill myself a month ago because of them, it wasn’t happenening again, the end goal to prove what i knew all all along, it was harrowing, like nightmare i couldnt have even dreamt of,so much effort put in and it was all for me. Sat in my pants transcribing my world caving in

notes: May 9 entry sets intent to prove systemic failings; raw vernacular preserved.
